name: Calvin (demo)
description:
Calvin is a 2D point&click adventure game by LeCroissantCyclope.

It's the story of Calvin, a not-succeeding-to-do-anything-with-his-life man, who is gonna live a tremendous adventure. There's intergalactic war so it's going to be awesome, and kinda absurd. Yeah totally.

Beware, voices are in french. :)

I used Adventure Game Studio for this first version and I'm thinking about using the Godot Engine for a new version.
